project.importText: Import your projects and tasks from other services into Vikunja:

404.title: Not found
404.text: The page you requested does not exist.

ready.checkApiUrl: Please check if the api url is correct.
ready.noApiUrlConfigured: No API url was configured. Please set one below:

offline.title: You are offline.
offline.text: Please check your network connection and try again.

auth.resetPasswordAction: Send me a password reset link
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Check your inbox! You should have an e-mail with instructions on how to reset your password.
auth.confirmEmailSuccess: You successfully confirmed your email! You can log in now.
auth.openIdStateError: State does not match, refusing to continue!
auth.openIdGeneralError: An error occured while authenticating against the third party.
auth.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.

settings.title: Settings
settings.passwordsDontMatch: The new password and its confirmation don't match.
settings.updateEmailSuccess: Your email address was successfully updated. We've sent you a link to confirm it.

general.title: General Settings
general.name: Name
general.emailReminders: Send me reminders for tasks via Email
general.overdueReminders: Send me a summary of my undone overdue tasks every day
general.discoverableByName: Let other users find me when they search for my name
general.discoverableByEmail: Let other users find me when they search for my full email
general.playSoundWhenDone: Play a sound when marking tasks as done

totp.title: Two Factor Authentication
totp.finishSetupPart1: To finish your setup, use this secret in your totp app (Google Authenticator or similar):
totp.finishSetupPart2: After that, enter a code from your app below.
totp.scanQR: Alternatively you can scan this QR code:
totp.passcodePlaceholder: A code generated by your totp application
totp.setupSuccess: You've successfully set up two factor authentication!
totp.confirmSuccess: You've successfully confirmed your totp setup and can use it from now on!
totp.disableSuccess: Two factor authentication was successfully disabled.

caldav.title: CalDAV
caldav.howTo: You can connect Vikunja to CalDAV clients to view and manage all tasks from different clients. Enter this url into your client:
caldav.more: More information about CalDAV in Vikunja
caldav.tokensHowTo: You can use a CalDAV token to use instead of a password to log in the above endpoint.
caldav.wontSeeItAgain: Write it down, you won't be able to see it again.
caldav.mustUseToken: You need to create a CalDAV token if you want to use CalDAV with a third party client. Use the token as the password.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.setSuccess: The avatar has been set successfully!

appearance.title: Color Scheme
appearance.setSuccess: Saved change of color scheme to {colorScheme}

deletion.title: Delete your Vikunja Account
deletion.text1: The deletion of your account is permanent and cannot be undone. We will delete all your projects, tasks and everything associated with it.
deletion.text2: To proceed, please enter your password. You will receive an email with further instructions.
deletion.requestSuccess: The request was successful. You'll receive an email with further instructions.
deletion.confirmSuccess: You've successfully confirmed the deletion of your account. We will delete your account in three days.
deletion.scheduled: We will delete your Vikunja account at {date} ({dateSince}).
deletion.scheduledCancel: To cancel the deletion of your account, click here.
deletion.scheduledCancelText: To cancel the deletion of your account, please enter your password below:
deletion.scheduledCancelConfirm: Cancel the deletion of my account
deletion.scheduledCancelSuccess: We will not delete your account.

export.title: Export your Vikunja data
export.description: You can request a copy of all your Vikunja data. This include Namespaces, Projects, Tasks and everything associated to them. You can import this data in any Vikunja instance through the migration function.
export.descriptionPasswordRequired: Please enter your password to proceed:
export.request: Request a copy of my Vikunja Data
export.success: You've successfully requested your Vikunja Data! We will send you an email once it's ready to download.

project.archivedMessage: This project is archived. It is not possible to create new or edit tasks for it.
project.title: Project Title
project.search: Type to search for a project…
project.searchSelect: Click or press enter to select this project

create.addProjectRequired: Please specify a project or set a default project in the settings.

archive.title: Archive "{project}"
archive.unarchiveText: You will be able to create new tasks or edit it.
archive.archiveText: You won't be able to edit this project or create new tasks until you un-archive it.

background.title: Set project background
background.upload: Choose a background from your pc
background.success: The background has been set successfully!
background.removeSuccess: The background has been removed successfully!

delete.title: Delete "{project}"
delete.text1: Are you sure you want to delete this project and all of its contents?
delete.text2: This includes all tasks and CANNOT BE UNDONE!
delete.tasksToDelete: This will irrevocably remove approx. {count} tasks.
delete.noTasksToDelete: This project does not contain any tasks, it should be safe to delete.

duplicate.title: Duplicate this project
duplicate.label: Duplicate
duplicate.text: Select a parent project which should hold the duplicated project:

edit.title: Edit "{project}"
edit.identifierTooltip: The project identifier can be used to uniquely identify a task across projects. You can set it to empty to disable it.

links.title: Share Links
links.explanation: Share Links allow you to easily share a project with other users who don't have an account on Vikunja.
links.name: Name (optional)
links.nameExplanation: All actions done by this link share will show up with the name.
links.passwordExplanation: When authenticating, the user will be required to enter this password.
links.removeText: Are you sure you want to remove this link share? It will no longer be possible to access this project with this link share. This cannot be undone!
links.createSuccess: The link share was successfully created.
links.deleteSuccess: The link share was successfully deleted

userTeam.removeText: Are you sure you want to remove this {sharable} from the {type}? This cannot be undone!
userTeam.removeSuccess: The {sharable} was successfully removed from the {type}.

gantt.title: Gantt
gantt.showTasksWithoutDates: Show tasks which don't have dates set
gantt.noDates: This task has no dates set.

kanban.title: Kanban
kanban.doneBucketHint: All tasks moved into this bucket will automatically marked as done.
kanban.doneBucketHintExtended: All tasks moved into the done bucket will be marked as done automatically. All tasks marked as done from elsewhere will be moved as well.
kanban.doneBucketSavedSuccess: The done bucket has been saved successfully.
kanban.deleteLast: You cannot remove the last bucket.
kanban.deleteBucketText1: Are you sure you want to delete this bucket?
kanban.deleteBucketText2: This will not delete any tasks but move them into the default bucket.
kanban.deleteBucketSuccess: The bucket has been deleted successfully.
kanban.bucketTitleSavedSuccess: The bucket title has been saved successfully.
kanban.bucketLimitSavedSuccess: The bucket limit been saved successfully.

attributes.title: Title
attributes.titlePlaceholder: The saved filter title goes here…
attributes.includeNulls: Include Tasks which don't have a value set
attributes.requireAll: Require all filters to be true for a task to show up

create.title: New Saved Filter
create.description: A saved filter is a virtual project which is computed from a set of filters each time it is accessed.
create.titleRequired: Please provide a title for the filter.

delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this saved filter?

migrate.title: Import from other services
migrate.titleService: Import your data from {name} into Vikunja
migrate.description: Click on the logo of one of the third-party services below to get started.
migrate.descriptionDo: Vikunja will import all lists, tasks, notes, reminders and files you have access to.
migrate.authorize: To authorize Vikunja to access your {name} Account, click the button below.
migrate.alreadyMigrated1: It looks like you've already imported your stuff from {name} at {date}.
migrate.alreadyMigrated2: Importing again is possible, but might create duplicates. Are you sure?
migrate.confirm: I am sure, please start migrating now!
migrate.importUpload: To import data from {name} into Vikunja, click the button below to select a file.

label.title: Labels
label.description: Click on a label to edit it. You can edit all labels you created, you can use all labels which are associated with a task to whose project you have access.
label.newCTA: You currently do not have any labels.
label.search: Type to search for a label…

edit.forbidden: You are not allowed to edit this label because you dont own it.

sharing.passwordRequired: This shared project requires a password. Please enter it below:

multiselect.selectPlaceholder: Click or press enter to select

datemathHelp.canuse: You can use date math to filter for relative dates.
datemathHelp.title: Date Math
datemathHelp.intro: Date Math allows you to specify relative dates which are resolved on the fly by Vikunja when applying the filter.
datemathHelp.expression: Each Date Math expression starts with an anchor date, which can either be {0}, or a date string ending with {1}. This anchor date can optionally be followed by one or more maths expressions.
datemathHelp.similar: These expressions are similar to the ones provided by {0} and {1}.
datemathHelp.roundDay: Round down to the nearest day

examples.beginningOfThisWeek: The beginning of this week at 00:00
examples.datePlusMonth: {0} plus one month at 00:00 of that day

task.doneSuccess: The task was successfully marked as done.
task.undoneSuccess: The task was successfully un-marked as done.

show.noTasks: Nothing to do — Have a nice day!

detail.chooseDueDate: Click here to set a due date
detail.chooseStartDate: Click here to set a start date
detail.chooseEndDate: Click here to set an end date
detail.move: Move task to a different project
detail.deleteSuccess: The task has been deleted successfully.

delete.text1: Are you sure you want to remove this task?
delete.text2: This will also remove all attachments, reminders and relations associated with this task and cannot be undone!

subscription.subscribedTaskThroughParentProject: You can't unsubscribe here because you are subscribed to this task through its project.
subscription.subscribedProject: You are currently subscribed to this project and will receive notifications for changes.
subscription.notSubscribedProject: You are not subscribed to this project and won't receive notifications for changes.
subscription.subscribedTask: You are currently subscribed to this task and will receive notifications for changes.
subscription.notSubscribedTask: You are not subscribed to this task and won't receive notifications for changes.
subscription.subscribeSuccessProject: You are now subscribed to this project
subscription.unsubscribeSuccessProject: You are now unsubscribed to this project
subscription.subscribeSuccessTask: You are now subscribed to this task
subscription.unsubscribeSuccessTask: You are now unsubscribed to this task

attachment.title: Attachments
attachment.deleteText1: Are you sure you want to delete the attachment {filename}?
attachment.copyUrlTooltip: Copy the url of this attachment for usage in text
attachment.successfullyChangedCoverImage: The cover image was successfully changed.

comment.title: Comments
comment.deleteText1: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

description.placeholder: Click here to enter a description…

assignee.assignSuccess: The user has been assigned successfully.
assignee.unassignSuccess: The user has been unassigned successfully.

label.placeholder: Type to add a new label…
label.addSuccess: The label has been added successfully.
label.createSuccess: The label has been created successfully.
label.removeSuccess: The label has been removed successfully.
label.addCreateSuccess: The label has been created and added successfully.

delete.text1: Are you sure you want to delete this label?
delete.text2: This will remove it from all tasks and cannot be restored.

relation.searchPlaceholder: Type search for a new task to add as related…
relation.createPlaceholder: Add this as new related task
relation.differentProject: This task belongs to a different project.
relation.deleteText1: Are you sure you want to delete this task relation?
relation.taskRequired: Please select a task or enter a new task title.

quickAddMagic.hint: You can use Quick Add Magic
quickAddMagic.title: Quick Add Magic
quickAddMagic.intro: When creating a task, you can use special keywords to directly add attributes to the newly created task. This allows to add commonly used attributes to tasks much faster.
quickAddMagic.multiple: You can use this multiple times.
quickAddMagic.label1: To add a label, simply prefix the name of the label with {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.label2: Vikunja will first check if the label already exist and create it if not.
quickAddMagic.label3: To use spaces, simply add a " or ' around the label name.
quickAddMagic.priority1: To set a task's priority, add a number 1-5, prefixed with a {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.priority2: The higher the number, the higher the priority.
quickAddMagic.assignees: To directly assign the task to a user, add their username prefixed with {prefix} to the task.
quickAddMagic.project1: To set a project for the task to appear in, enter its name prefixed with {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.project2: This will return an error if the project does not exist.
quickAddMagic.project3: To use spaces, simply add a " or ' around the project name.
quickAddMagic.date: Any date will be used as the due date of the new task. You can use dates in any of these formats:
quickAddMagic.dateWeekday: any weekday, will use the next date with that date
quickAddMagic.dateNth: will use the {day}th of the current month
quickAddMagic.dateTime: Combine any of the date formats with "{time}" (or {timePM}) to set a time.
quickAddMagic.repeatsDescription: To set a task as repeating in an interval, simply add '{suffix}' to the task text. The amount needs to be a number and can be omitted to use just the type (see examples).

team.title: Teams
team.noTeams: You are currently not part of any teams.

edit.title: Edit Team "{team}"
edit.userAddedSuccess: The team member was successfully added.
edit.madeMember: The team member was successfully made member.
edit.madeAdmin: The team member was successfully made admin.

delete.text1: Are you sure you want to delete this team and all of its members?
delete.text2: All team members will lose access to projects shared with this team. This CANNOT BE UNDONE!

deleteUser.header: Remove a user from the team
deleteUser.text1: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the team?
deleteUser.text2: They will lose access to all projects this team has access to. This CANNOT BE UNDONE!
deleteUser.success: The user was successfully deleted from the team.

leave.title: Leave team
leave.text1: Are you sure you want to leave this team?
leave.text2: You will lose access to all projects this team has access to. If you change your mind you'll need a team admin to add you again.
leave.success: You have successfully left the team.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.allPages: These shortcuts work on all pages.
keyboardShortcuts.currentPageOnly: These shortcuts work only on the current page.
keyboardShortcuts.somePagesOnly: These shortcuts work only on some pages.

task.assign: Assign this task to a user

task.attachment: Add an attachment to this task
task.related: Modify related tasks of this task
task.color: Change the color of this task

task.description: Toggle editing of the task description

apiConfig.error: Could not find or use Vikunja installation at "{domain}". Please try a different url.

loadingError.failed: Loading failed, please {0}. If the error persists, please {1}.

notification.title: Notifications
notification.none: You don't have any notifications. Have a nice day!
notification.explainer: Notifications will appear here when actions projects or tasks you subscribed to happen.

quickActions.hint: You can use {project} to limit the search to a project. Combine {project} or {label} (labels) with a search query to search for a task with these labels or on that project. Use {assignee} to only search for teams.
quickActions.newProject: Enter the title of the new project…
quickActions.newTask: Enter the title of the new task…
quickActions.newTeam: Enter the name of the new team…
quickActions.createTask: Create a task in the current project ({title})

error.0001: You're not allowed to do that.

error.1006: Could not get the user id.

error.1016: Totp is not enabled for this user.

error.2002: Some of the request data was invalid.
error.3004: You need to have read permissions on that project to perform that action.
error.3005: The project title cannot be empty.
error.3006: The project share does not exist.
error.3007: A project with this identifier already exists.
error.3008: The project is archived and can therefore only be accessed read only. This is also true for all tasks associated with this project.
error.4001: The project task text cannot be empty.
error.4002: The project task does not exist.
error.4003: All bulk editing tasks must belong to the same project.
error.4004: Need at least one task when bulk editing tasks.
error.4005: You do not have the right to see the task.
error.4006: You can't set a parent task as the task itself.
error.4007: You can't create a task relation with an invalid kind of relation.
error.4008: You can't create a task relation which already exists.
error.4009: The task relation does not exist.
error.4010: Cannot relate a task with itself.
error.4011: The task attachment does not exist.
error.4012: The task attachment is too large.
error.4013: The task sort param is invalid.
error.4014: The task sort order is invalid.
error.4015: The task comment does not exist.
error.6001: The team name cannot be empty.
error.6004: The team already has access to that project.
error.6005: The user is already a member of that team.
error.6006: Cannot delete the last team member.
error.6007: The team does not have access to the project to perform that action.
error.7002: The user already has access to that project.
error.7003: You do not have access to that project.
error.8001: This label already exists on that task.
error.8003: You do not have access to this label.
error.10002: The bucket does not belong to that project.
error.10003: You cannot remove the last bucket on a project.
error.10004: You cannot add the task to this bucket as it already exceeded the limit of tasks it can hold.
error.10005: There can be only one done bucket per project.
error.11001: The saved filter does not exist.
error.11002: Saved filters are not available for link shares.
error.12001: The subscription entity type is invalid.
error.12002: You are already subscribed to the entity itself or a parent entity.
error.13001: This link share requires a password for authentication, but none was provided.
error.13002: The provided link share password was invalid.
